m_DescList: Adding a table of contents in Markdown is an effective way to enhance document organization and readability.
In Markdown, this will be rendered as:
<color=#ee3300>-</color> starts the line, followed by a whitespace character
<color=#e06600>#chapter-1</color> is the anchor link (including # but excluding spaces). Spaces in headings are replaced by <color=#e06600>-</color>
Special case: When title or link content is missing, some Markdown previewers fail to parse:
We may consider this an invalid TOC format
Now we need to design a regex to extract TOC content with these requirements:
2. Each test case contains multiple TOC lines
Please construct a regex that passes all test cases on the right.
